overview.en: DDXP is a pass-through upgrade for the existing public welfare development dilemma. It is based on the super-block technology of the blockchain based on Super Gold. It fully utilizes the unique advantages of deblocking, traceability and non-tamperability of the blockchain. Mechanism, and introduce a new generation of public welfare blockchain applications for emerging technologies such as the Internet of Things and big data.
overview.zh: DDXP是针对现有公益发展困境的一次通证化升级，是基于区块链底层技术Super Gold的基础上，充分运用区块链的去中心化、可追溯、不可篡改等独特优势，采用DPOS共识机制，并引入物联网、大数据等新兴技术的新一代公益性的区块链应用。
